actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to provide privacy protection for consumers using electronic funds transfer services.

summary.text: Electronic Funds Transfer Privacy Act - Amends the Consumer Credit Protection Act to prohibit any institution from disclosing information regarding any electronic funds transfer with respect to a consumer account except: (1) to the account holder; (2) to a party to the transfer or a party necessary to effectuate the transfer; (3) to a person or consumer reporting agency authorized by law to have access to the records of such institution; (4) pursuant to a court order; or (5) pursuant to the express written authorization of the account holder for a particular purpose.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to provide privacy protection for consumers using electronic funds transfer services.
